## Title for this session

Write using markdown. 

two \* or _ toggles **bold**  

one \* or _ toggles *italics*

use two spaces as the end of a line to return. or hit enter twice

use \# to make sections. The highest in this journal (the title above) is \#\#. Use more \# to get a lower level. So if you have a subsection of your journal entry, start it off with 

\#\#\# \<your section title\>

on a line by itself and continue writing below

you can add tags to you to your journal entry if you want. it isn't needed though.
